ISSUE.TITLE: Clear log with sliding windows
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.2 Steps to reproduce the problem: currently there is a scheduled task which truncates the log table on a set frequency. Will be very useful to modify this schedule/create new one which delete logs that are older than a set retention period. Number of days to keep logs will be defined via a configuration variable. Since I have done this change, I am happy to contribute.
